# How to replace a percentage value with a bar in your grid tile

When displaying data in a grid tile presenting % used visually will have more impact over simply showing the numerical value. Use the following mustache custom label to convert a numerical percentage into an eye catching visual!

```
<img alt="Embedded Image"src="data:image/png;base64,"  width={{value*4}} height=15 /> <img alt="Embedded Image" src="data:image/png;base64,"  width={{(100-value)*4}} height=15 /> {{value}} %
```

## How to use in SquaredUp
1. Edit the grid tile that has a percentage column
2. Edit the column containing the percentage value
3. Paste the snippet above into the custom template mustache field

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18680913/123941021-ab28df80-d991-11eb-843e-9788a5273948.png)
